Lyrics:
1 ContributorCrooks & The Damned Lyrics[Verse 1]
Calm Innocence, your confidence is the door
To know where you're from
The answer resounds
And it’s the way that it sits in my gut
We can’t be here right now
And it’s the way that it sifts my blood
Can I really be in control?

[Chorus]
Who would ever wanna be
Stuck inside a mind that was built by another person?
Who would I turn out to be?
Lost without a fire burning bright on the inside
And it’s a long way from the life we were shown
Who would I turn out to be?
Lost without a fire burning bright on the inside

[Verse 2]
Crooks and the damned, they’re always on the prowl
Caught in the con, we lose who we are
I think I know what I really am
I can always find true north
The fruit is heavy on the branch
And the roots are solid
You might also like[Breakdown]
Break from the past
Can we fight? Can we break the cycle?
Won’t be the one to perpetuate
This generational violence

[Chorus]
Who would ever wanna be
Stuck inside a mind that was built by another person?
Who would I turn out to be?
Lost without a fire burning bright on the inside
And it’s a long way from the life we were shown
Who would I turn out to be?
Lost without a fire burning bright on the inside

[Bridge]
So we go into the wild and great unknown
On our own to build the life that we want to
So we go into the wild and great unknown
On our own to build the life that we dream of
To build the life that we want to
To build the life that we dream of

[Chorus]
Who would ever wanna be
Stuck inside a mind that was built by another person?
Who would I turn out to be?
Lost without a fire burning bright on the inside
And it’s a long way from the life we were shown
Who would I turn out to be?
Lost without a fire burning bright on the insideEmbed
